title: New Honor Capsules
body:
Hi everyone,

sorry for my bad English, so: Can I ask you Rioters: If someone will get 5. honor level and get the capsule, he will get Grey Warwick or Medieval Twitch skin (ITS CLEAR), but my question is: later can I get more honor capsule because  getting the second skin? Or if I will get the Capsule for leveling up, this will be LAST honor capsule for me in season 2018?

Thanks for answer!

replies.body: AFAIK you can get the Warwick skin and then keep getting capsules for the chance of getting the Twitch one. You should be able to get both if you get enough capsules.
